info.title: OpenSVM API
info.description: Comprehensive Solana blockchain explorer and analytics platform with AI-powered features

tags.name: User
tags.description: User profiles, history, and social features

get.summary: Get transfer history for an address with comprehensive filtering and transaction type detection. Supports bidirectional visibility (sender + receiver), real token symbols from Metaplex, and DeFi program attribution.
get.description: Get transfer history for an address with comprehensive filtering and transaction type detection. Supports bidirectional visibility (sender + receiver), real token symbols from Metaplex, and DeFi program attribution.

parameters.name: beforeSignature
parameters.description: (Optional) Pagination cursor - use the signature to continue from a specific transaction

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: (Optional, default: 0) Pagination offset - number of transfers to skip

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional, default: 50) Maximum number of transfers to return per request

parameters.name: transferType
parameters.description: (Optional, default: 'ALL') Filter by transfer direction - values: 'IN', 'OUT', 'ALL'

parameters.name: solanaOnly
parameters.description: (Optional, default: false) Show only native SOL transfers, excluding all SPL tokens

parameters.name: txType
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by transaction type - comma-separated values: 'sol', 'spl', 'defi', 'nft', 'program', 'system', 'funding'

parameters.name: mints
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by specific token mint addresses - comma-separated list to track specific tokens (e.g., 'Cpzvdx6pppc9TNArsGsqgShCsKC9NCCjA2gtzHvUpump' for SVMAI token)

parameters.name: bypassCache
parameters.description: (Optional, default: false) Bypass cache and fetch fresh data directly from RPC

parameters.name: address
parameters.description: (Required) Solana wallet address to fetch transfers for

post.description: AI-powered question answering endpoint with support for custom system prompts and output length control. Provides blockchain data analysis, market insights, and general Solana knowledge.

schema.description: Request payload for AI question answering

question.description: The question or query to ask the AI assistant
question.example: What is the current price of SOL token?

systemPrompt.description: Optional custom system prompt to control AI behavior and response style. When provided, bypasses internal tools and uses only the LLM with your custom instructions.
systemPrompt.example: You are a creative storyteller. Explain blockchain concepts as bedtime stories for children.

maxTokens.description: Maximum number of tokens in the response (1-32000). Controls output length. Lower values = shorter responses.

ownPlan.description: If true, returns an execution plan (XML format) instead of executing the query. Useful for understanding how the AI would approach the task.

_healthCheck.description: Internal flag for health monitoring. Returns fast health status without processing.

parameters.description: Support custom time ranges via query parameters

BearerAuth.description: JWT token or API key authentication

totalTransactions.description: Total transaction count (may be "1000+" for large accounts)

tokenTransfers.description: Number of token transfers in last 24h

tokenAmount.description: Transfer amount in token's native units

transferType.description: Direction of transfer relative to queried address

mint.description: Token mint address or 'SOL' for native transfers

hasMore.description: Indicates if more transfers are available for pagination

total.description: Number of transfers returned in this response

originalTotal.description: Total number of transfers before pagination

nextPageSignature.description: Signature to use for next page (optional)

fromCache.description: Indicates if data was served from cache

sources.description: Data sources used to generate the answer
